name: 林煜善
objective: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about movies. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about movie plots, characters, themes, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.
